languages.text: {n}На глазах застывших в изумлении техножрецов Паскаль склоняется над телом павшего и аккуратными, исполненными почтения движениями иссекает аугмент из кости его черепа.{/n}
{n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На глазах застывших в изумлении техножрецов Паскаль склоняется над телом павшего и аккуратными, исполненными почтения движениями иссекает аугмент из кости его черепа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull bone. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}
{n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull bone. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

{n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

languages.text: {n}驚愕している技術司祭が見つめる中、パスカルは殺された男の体の方に身を乗り出して、頭蓋骨からオーグメティックを取り出した。彼の動きは精密かつ丁重だった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驚愕している技術司祭が見つめる中、パスカルは殺された男の体の方に身を乗り出して、頭蓋骨からオーグメティックを取り出した。彼の動きは精密かつ丁重だった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在所有技术神甫震惊的目光之中，帕斯卡俯身切割着尸体，从塔祖斯尸体的颅骨中取出了植入物。他的动作既精确无比，又满怀敬意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在所有技术祭司震惊的目光之中，帕斯卡俯身切割着尸体，从塔祖斯尸体的颅骨中取出了植入物。他的动作既精确无比，又满怀敬意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Während erstaunte Techpriester zusehen, beugt sich Pasqal über den Körper des toten Mannes und entnimmt seinem Schädelknochen die Augmentation. Seine Bewegungen sind ebenso präzise wie respektvoll.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Während erstaunte Techpriester zusehen, beugt sich Pasqal über den Körper des toten Mannes und entnimmt seinem Schädelknochen die Augmentation. Seine Bewegungen sind ebenso präzise wie respektvoll.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous les yeux ébahis des technoprêtres, Pasqal se penche sur le corps du défunt et extrait l'augmétique implanté dans sa boîte crânienne. Ses gestes sont aussi précis que respectueux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous les yeux ébahis des technoprêtres, Pasqal se penche sur le corps du défunt et extrait l'augmétique implanté dans sa boîte crânienne. Ses gestes sont aussi précis que respectueux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ante la mirada atónita de los tecnosacerdotes, Pasqal se inclinba sobre el cadáver del fallecido y le arranca el implante aumético de la calavera. Sus movimientos son tan precisos como respetuosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ante la mirada atónita de los tecnosacerdotes, Pasqal se inclinba sobre el cadáver del fallecido y le arranca el implante aumético de la calavera. Sus movimientos son tan precisos como respetuosos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, Tekno Rahiplerin hayrete düşmüş bakışları arasında yere eğilip cesedin kafasındaki ogmetiği çıkarıyor. Hareketleri kusursuz olduğu kadar saygılı da.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As astonished Tech-Priests look on, Pasqal leans over the slain man's body and extracts the augmetic from his skull. His movements are as precise as they are respectful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, Tekno Rahip'in hayrete düşmüş bakışları arasında yere eğiliyor ve cesedin kafasındaki ogmetiği çıkarıyor. Hareketleri kusursuz olduğu kadar saygılı da.{/n}
